roughcut.media.videoeditor

Class WaveformData

  • java.lang.Object
    • roughcut.media.videoeditor.WaveformData

  • public class WaveformData
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which describes the waveform data of an audio track. The gain values represent the average gain for an audio frame. For audio codecs which do not operate on a per frame bases (eg. ALAW, ULAW) a reasonable audio frame duration will be assumed (eg. 50ms).

    • Method Detail

      • getFrameDuration

        public int getFrameDuration()
        Returns:
        The duration of a frame in milliseconds

      • getFramesCount

        public int getFramesCount()
        Returns:
        The number of frames within the waveform data

      • getFrameGains

        public short[] getFrameGains()
        Returns:
        The array of frame gains. The size of the array is the frames count. The values of the frame gains range from 0 to 255.
